title: Govt allocates Rs 15,005.801 mln for Housing & Works Division
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 10 (APP): Federal Government has allocated a total amount of Rs 15,005.801 million for the ongoing and new schemes of Housing and Works Division for the fiscal year 2025-26 under the Public Sector Development Programme (PSDP).
According to the budget document issued here on Tuesday, the allocation includes Rs 14,805.801 million for twenty five ongoing projects and Rs 200.000 million for two new development schemes.
The two new development schemes included Construction of RCC Pre-Stressed Bridge Mari Safdar Shah at Siren River UC Behrkund Tehsil & District Mansehra and Construction of RCC Pre-Stressed Bridge at Shah Da Panja at Siren River UC Behrkund Tehsil & District Mansehra.
